reviews.text:
Extremely bad service.
I ordered a Double bed from RTD delivery was on 21/11/24 but it was not on time . Manager delivered it on 30/11/24 and the next day my marriage but I didn‚Äôt have the time to inspect it . Manager (Mr Deepak) assured it that if anything is not up to the mark he will directly replace it . Problem came that the ply wood of the bed was bent but tha manager keeps ignoring it and denied for the replacement. Then I complaint the same to the Owner (Mr Satpal Saluja )but he also showed the careless behaviour and refused to accept the calls . I am facing this problem from past 3 months ,i have ordered approx 1.5 lakh items from RTD but still the value of customers is zero

Post sale service is good but the products are worst in quality, even if you are spending 7000-8000 on a single chair, you will get low quality product.

I highly recommend go for another shop, don't purchase the product from this showroom. They are selling cheap quality product.

Poor quality furniture, they show and commit something else and deliver a different product altogether.

name: Agarwal Furniture Showroom
address: Sindhi Colony, Neel Ganga Road, MP SH 18, Sindhi Colony, Ujjain, Madhya Pradesh 456006, India

reviews.text: Absolutely appalling experience at this furniture shop! Save yourself the agony and toss your money into a dumpster instead of wasting it here. We ordered a double bed, wardrobe, and dressing table, and all we got were subpar products that fell apart faster than a house of cards in a hurricane. Their service is atrocious, their quality is abysmal, and they couldn't understand a customer's needs if it hit them in the face. If there was a negative rating, they'd be swimming in it. Avoid like the plague!

My experience with Agrawal Furniture Showroom has been nothing short of a disappointment. Their lack of responsiveness and poor customer service has left me regretting my decision to purchase from them. I would strongly advise potential customers to think twice before considering this seller.

Unresponsive over calls, ordered a mandir had to visit 2-3 times at the store. First took 5000Rs. as deposit and took another 15 days in sending relevant designs then took a week to send his worker for taking measurements. Committed that they would be delivering in 15 days post confirmation now they are unable to deliver.
